name: Prashant Kumar Jha
about:
A passionate and results-driven Full Stack Software Engineer with a strong foundation in JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, and a variety of other technologies.
With a Master's in Computer Science and Engineering from the University at Buffalo, I have a solid academic background that complements my practical experience.
Over the years, I have had the privilege of working on diverse projects, from developing real-time notification systems for the aviation industry to creating inclusive applications like Vozzz, a text-to-speech tool for differently-abled children.
My work has consistently focused on enhancing performance, optimizing code, and delivering solutions that meet or exceed business requirements.
I thrive in collaborative environments and leverage my skills in software design, development, and cloud technologies to create innovative and efficient solutions. Feel free to explore my portfolio and get in touch to discuss potential collaborations or opportunities.
